title: Martin Newell - The Greatest Living Englishman (1993)
description:
Martin Newell With Andy Partridge (XTC) - The Greatest Living Englishman (1993)

MP3 320

Martin Newell (born 1953), also known as "the Wild Man of Wivenhoe", is an English rock musician, poet and author. He grew up in an army family in various parts of England and the Far East. His music is guitar pop with clever lyrics and jangly, upbeat, guitar-centric arrangements.
His first solo album, The Greatest Living Englishman, produced by XTC's Andy Partridge, was a critical success. Commercially, it remains his most popular and successful album. 

Tracks:
01. Goodbye Dreaming Fields  
02. Before the Hurricane  
03. We'll Build a House  
04. Greatest Living Englishman  
05. She Rings the Changes  
06. Home Counties Boy  
07. Street Called Prospect  
08. Christmas in Suburbia  
09. Straight to You Boy  
10. Jangling Man  
11. Green-Gold Girl of Summer  
12. Englishman's Home
